2024 年 4 月 1 日星期一 08:07:38 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
中国煤炭开采的人力成本|王晓君王晓君Xiaojun "Tom" Wang grew up in the Chinese province of Shanxi, the world's largest coal producer. Each year, more than a billion tons of coal are dug out of Shanxi's mountains, and the impacts are devastating — from massive landslides to damaged cultural sites and threats to human health. Wang illuminates the need for sustainable alternatives to protect the environment and ancestral homes, underscoring the rich heritage and untapped potential of provinces like his own.中国煤炭开采的人力成本|王晓君Xiaojun "Tom" Wang grew up in the Chinese province of Shanxi, the world's largest coal producer. Each year, more than a billion tons of coal are dug out of Shanxi's mountains, and the impacts are devastating — from massive landslides to damaged cultural sites and threats to human health. Wang illuminates the need for sustainable alternatives to protect the environment and ancestral homes, underscoring the rich heritage and untapped potential of provinces like his own. https://www.ted.com/talks/xiaojun_tom_wang_the_ human_cost_of_coal_mining_in_china?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127268 127268 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 14:45:34 +0000高等教育不00:14:03泰德
如何忍受经济末日？菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克Economic crises can and do happen. But for every true crisis, there are many false alarms, says economist Philipp Carlsson-Szlezak. He explains how to live with the media's pervasive economic doomsaying, why we should stop treating financial forecasts like a precise science — and what we should embrace instead.如何忍受经济末日？菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克Economic crises can and do happen. But for every true crisis, there are many false alarms, says economist Philipp Carlsson-Szlezak. He explains how to live with the media's pervasive economic doomsaying, why we should stop treating financial forecasts like a precise science — and what we should embrace instead. https://www.ted.com/talks/philipp_carlsson_szlezak_how_to_live_with_economic_doomsaying?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127368 127368 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 14:56:10 +0000高等教育不00:09:59泰德
邀请您帮助建设可持续的未来 |吉姆·斯纳布吉姆·斯纳布"If we want to avoid a climate disaster, we need much more radical leadership," says Jim Snabe, who knows a thing or two about leadership as chairman of the world's largest maritime shipping company. In a stirring talk, he encourages companies to take big, bold actions to tackle climate change — and invites anyone to join the TED Future Forum, a new initiative focused on the role of business in advancing solutions to the climate crisis.邀请您帮助建设可持续的未来 |吉姆·斯纳布"If we want to avoid a climate disaster, we need much more radical leadership," says Jim Snabe, who knows a thing or two about leadership as chairman of the world's largest maritime shipping company. In a stirring talk, he encourages companies to take big, bold actions to tackle climate change — and invites anyone to join the TED Future Forum, a new initiative focused on the role of business in advancing solutions to the climate crisis. https://www.ted.com/talks/jim_snabe_your_invitation_to_help_build_a_sustainable_future?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:126806 126806 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 14:47:16 +0000高等教育不00:06:15泰德
让你的花园狂野起来 |丽贝卡·麦克麦金丽贝卡·麦克麦金Many gardeners work hard to maintain clean, tidy environments ... which is the exact opposite of what wildlife wants, says ecological horticulturist Rebecca McMackin. She shows the beauty of letting your garden run wild, surveying the success she's had increasing biodiversity even in the middle of New York City — and offers tips for cultivating a garden that can be home to birds, bees, butterflies and more.让你的花园狂野起来 |丽贝卡·麦克麦金Many gardeners work hard to maintain clean, tidy environments ... which is the exact opposite of what wildlife wants, says ecological horticulturist Rebecca McMackin. 为什么我们还没有更好的机器人？ |肯·戈德堡肯·戈德堡Why hasn't the dream of having a robot at home to do your chores become a reality yet? With three decades of research expertise in the field, roboticist Ken Goldberg sheds light on the clumsy truth about robots — and what it will take to build more dexterous machines to work in a warehouse or help out at home.为什么我们还没有更好的机器人？ |肯·戈德堡Why hasn't the dream of having a robot at home to do your chores become a reality yet? With three decades of research expertise in the field, roboticist Ken Goldberg sheds light on the clumsy truth about robots — and what it will take to build more dexterous machines to work in a warehouse or help out at home. https://www.ted.com/talks/ken_goldberg_why_don_t_we_have_better_robots_yet?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127267 127267 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 14:52:09 +0000高等教育不00:12:06泰德
更好地与人类同胞联系的 3 个步骤 |琥珀卡布拉尔琥珀卡布拉尔How can you effectively support people at work and in your community, especially when they're different from you? Inclusion strategist Amber Cabral shares three steps you can take to build connection — emphasizing that even small, everyday actions can make a big difference to those around you.更好地与人类同胞联系的 3 个步骤 |琥珀卡布拉尔How can you effectively support people at work and in your community, especially when they're different from you? 商界领袖如何重振民主？达妮埃拉·巴卢-阿雷斯达妮埃拉·巴卢-阿雷斯How much should business leaders speak out about threats to democracy? It's a question many corporations are wrestling with these days. Business and democracy leader Daniella Ballou-Aares shows why companies have both the ability and the responsibility to engage in protecting elections and the rule of law — and why their bottom lines may depend on doing so.商界领袖如何重振民主？达妮埃拉·巴卢-阿雷斯How much should business leaders speak out about threats to democracy? 如何选衣服才能长寿，而不是垃圾填埋场|迪亚拉·布索迪亚拉·布索Buying cheap clothing online can be satisfying, but it comes with not-so-hidden environmental costs. When designer Diarra Bousso was growing up in Senegal, her family bought and created new outfits for longevity rather than on impulse — an intention she carries forth in her fashion tech brand. Outlining three sustainable principles, including crowdsourcing designs and limiting excess inventory, Bousso shows it's possible to decrease waste while increasing profit — and shares how to apply this wisdom across the fashion industry.如何选衣服才能长寿，而不是垃圾填埋场|迪亚拉·布索Buying cheap clothing online can be satisfying, but it comes with not-so-hidden environmental costs. When designer Diarra Bousso was growing up in Senegal, her family bought and created new outfits for longevity rather than on impulse — an intention she carries forth in her fashion tech brand. Outlining three sustainable principles, including crowdsourcing designs and limiting excess inventory, Bousso shows it's possible to decrease waste while increasing profit — and shares how to apply this wisdom across the fashion industry. https://www.ted.com/talks/diarra_bousso_how_to_choose_clothes_for_longevity_not_the_landfill?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:126568 126568 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 14:35:44 +0000高等教育不00:10:44泰德
人工智能与自我替代工人的悖论|麦迪逊·莫恩斯麦迪逊·莫恩斯As companies introduce AI into the workplace to increase productivity, an uncomfortable paradox is emerging: people are often responsible for training the very systems that might displace them. AI ethics advocate Madison Mohns presents three leadership principles to embrace technological progress while prioritizing your coworkers' well-being — paving the way for a future where AI enhances human potential.人工智能与自我替代工人的悖论|麦迪逊·莫恩斯As companies introduce AI into the workplace to increase productivity, an uncomfortable paradox is emerging: people are often responsible for training the very systems that might displace them. AI ethics advocate Madison Mohns presents three leadership principles to embrace technological progress while prioritizing your coworkers' well-being — paving the way for a future where AI enhances human potential. https://www.ted.com/talks/madison_mohns_ai_and_the_paradox_of_self_replacing_workers?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:126880 126880 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 14:44:48 +0000高等教育不00:09:13泰德
关于幸福的 5 堂课——从流行名声到毒蛇 |迈克·波斯纳迈克·波斯纳Singer-songwriter Mike Posner took a break from his music to take a walk — a very long walk, across the entire United States. He shares five lessons he learned from his epic, eventful trek (snakes might be involved) and how it helped him find the key to happiness. (He also performs two hit songs: "I Took a Pill in Ibiza" and "Could You Do the Same.")关于幸福的 5 堂课——从流行名声到毒蛇 |迈克·波斯纳Singer-songwriter Mike Posner took a break from his music to take a walk — a very long walk, across the entire United States. (He also performs two hit songs: "I Took a Pill in Ibiza" and "Could You Do the Same.") https://www.ted.com/talks/mike_posner_5_lessons_on_happiness_from_pop_fame_to_poisonous_snakes?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118717 118717 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:02:13 +0000高等教育不00:17:51泰德
亲爱的难民同胞们，这就是我如何找到韧性的|尚塔莱祖兹领袖尚塔莱祖兹领袖Chantale Zuzi Leader is one of the millions of displaced people around the world. In a deeply moving talk, she reflects on losing her family, home and sense of safety — only to break through and ultimately find community and hope. It's an astounding story of resilience that speaks to today's refugee crisis.亲爱的难民同胞们，这就是我如何找到韧性的|尚塔莱祖兹领袖Chantale Zuzi Leader is one of the millions of displaced people around the world.
